1470249158426521601.full_text: 84yr ago today, Dec 13, 1937. Japan hold nation wide celebration of Imperial Japanese Army sacking the Chinese capital Nanjing. Japanese public rejoiced. 7 weeks long #NanjingMassacre followed. https://t.co/WxbwS8qDCv

1470242073148149764.full_text:
【（有片）大公報尋回舊錄像　南京大屠殺增新鐵證】
大公報記者自紐約尋獲一盒30年前德丁在紐約舉行記者會的全程錄影帶，德丁在95分鐘內答112問，徹底揭露日本極右政客篡改歷史的卑鄙行徑，具有十分重要的史料價值，是世界記憶遺產南京大屠殺最為重要的歷史文獻之一。https://t.co/LbWqvl1y7W https://t.co/1QGvrGvUYJ

1470260137990500355.full_text:
The history should not be forgotten. 

#Japan needs to apologize.

#Nanjing #NanjingMassacre

1470264450749919233.full_text:
Time will kill the witness, but time itself is also eternal evidence！默哀同胞！不忘国难！
 #NanjingMassacre https://t.co/74cOTjj4Ks

1470263633980850180.full_text: Silence for the victims of the #NanjingMassacre https://t.co/VDlsg4UaOC

1470258464509235201.full_text: Today  84th anniversary of one of the most brutal crimes against humanity of the 20th century the Nanjing Massacre, a six-week mass murder and mass rape committed by the Capitalist Japan Government  that began on Dec 13, 1937. Over 300,000 Chinese were killed. #NanjingMassacre https://t.co/LkQIfQ54Ig

1470263891078750211.full_text: Today is 12/13, the DAY commemorating dead people in #NanjingMassacre. In this slaughter, more than 300,000 people are killed by the Japanese army. Today, we are not saying to hatred Japan, but this pain should always be remembered. https://t.co/KZkrwI1BUO

1470261652830359556.full_text: The Imperial Japanese Army captured Nanjing on Dec. 13, 1937, then murdered an estimated 10,000-30,000 people during the 2-week-long #NanjingMassacre. U.S. priest John Gillespie Magee remained and documented events before and after the city's seizure. #China #WW2 https://t.co/sRayBRB2O7

1470259032271196168.full_text:
In 6 weeks, 300,000 Chinese in Nanjing were brutally murdered by Japanese invaders after they captured the city on Dec. 13, 1937.
Even though #China is much more developed, as a Chinese, I'll never forget this brutal war-torn history of my country.
#NanjingMassacre https://t.co/E0ehODyD7X

1470262543796957187.full_text:
昭昭前事，惕惕后人。
永矢弗谖，祈愿和平。

1470264720351322116.full_text: A memorial ceremony was held at a memorial hall in Nanjing, E China's Jiangsu Province, to mourn the 300,000 victims of the #NanjingMassacre. The national flag flew at half-mast in the square, and the people of Nanjing observed one minute of silence. https://t.co/IeZ6L0rQXE

715072364094955521.description: 香港大公文匯傳媒集團官方賬號。 《大公報》是著名中文報章，1902年創刊，迄今已有百餘年歷史；《文匯報》創刊于1948年，已連續出版七十多年，兩家在中國報業史上有着重要地位。
